root.name: Digital Combat Simulator: MiG-21Bis Fishbed
root.description: DCS: MiG-21, in development by Laszlo 'beczl' Becz, is the first supersonic jet to be developed for DCS World. The MiG-21 is the most produced supersonic jet and is in use today by over 50 countries. The aircraft is a multi-role fighter with air-to-air and air-to-ground capabilities and will feature the standard weapons for those roles as well as some lesser known armaments.Retarded BombsThis module will contain the standard features expected from a DCS title including:Full 6 DoF for TrackIR usersAccurate and clickable cockpitDetailed modeling of aircraft systems and avionicsDozens of highly detailed skinsAccurate flight model
